parameters.name: sourceLanguage
parameters.description:
the language code in which text is written. If it is set to the empty
    string, the source language code will be auto-detected

parameters.name: targetLanguage
parameters.description: the language code to which the text should be translated

methods.name: translate(text, sourceLanguage, targetLanguage)
methods.description: Automatically translates some text from a source language to a destination language.

the language code in which text is written. If it is set to the empty
    string, the source language code will be auto-detected

parameters.name: targetLanguage
parameters.description: the language code to which the text should be translated

methods.name: translate(text, sourceLanguage, targetLanguage, advancedArgs)
methods.description: Automatically translates some text from a source language to a destination language.
